extensionDescription: Displays a notification when the user clicks on the link.
prohibitingCharacterError: TAGID contains a prohibited character. TAGID :$TAGID$ row : $ROW$
tagIDLengthError: TAGID string length is between 3 and 64 characters. TAGID :$TAGID$ row : $ROW$
dateFormatError: Date range is from 1/1/1970 - current date/time. date :$DATE$ row : $ROW$
ageFormatError: Age is between 0 and 150. Age :$AGE$ rows : $ROW$
sexFormatError: Sex string is 2 characters maximum. Sex :$SEX$ rows : $ROW$
categoryFormatError: Category string is 64 characters maximum. Category :$CATEGORY$ rows : $ROW$
assocFormatError: Assoc string is 64 characters maximum. Assoc :$ASSOC$ rows : $ROW$
assocEmptyError: The Association column is required.  Row : $ROW$
symptomaticFormatError: Symptomatic string length is one character. Symptomatic :$SYMPTOMATIC$ row : $ROW$
symptomaticDataError: Symptomatic must be set to Y/N. Symptomatic :$SYMPTOMATIC$ row : $ROW$
descriptionFormatError: Description string is 64 characters maximum. Description :$DESCRIPTION$ row : $ROW$
noteFormateError: Note string is 255 characters maximum. Note :$NOTE$ rows : $ROW$
